body_html: @drpngx Thanks, yes XlaDynamicUpdateSlice seems exactly like what I was referring to. I see these ops have been added more recently and they do not yet have a public documented API for regular Python graph building but I guess they will eventually, so if it is a feature that is already being worked on maybe the issue can be closed?

body: @drpngx Thanks, yes `XlaDynamicUpdateSlice` seems exactly like what I was referring to. I see these ops have been added more recently and they do not yet have a public documented API for regular Python graph building but I guess they will eventually, so if it is a feature that is already being worked on maybe the issue can be closed?
